import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../StyleSheets/main.css' import '../StyleSheets/util.css' class Login extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { username: '', password: '' } } handleUsernameChange = (event) => { this.setState({ username: event.target.value }) } handlePasswordChange = (event) => { this.setState({ password: event.target.value }) } handleFormSubmit = (event) => { alert(`${this.state.username} ${this.state.password}`) event.preventDefault() } render() { return (
Member Login
Forgot Username / Password?
Create your Account
) } } export default Login
